data.eml:eml: A review of Hippeutister Reichensperger with new species from California and Costa Rica (Coleoptera: Histeridae: Hetaeriinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Caterino, Michael S., Tishechkin, Alexey K. (2008): A review of Hippeutister Reichensperger with new species from California and Costa Rica (Coleoptera: Histeridae: Hetaeriinae). Zootaxa 1895: 39-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.184407
